descriptionNullable:
I have modified the "20 newsgroups" dataset by removing empty data entries and converted it into a CSV format for easier analysis by the data science community. The "20 newsgroups" dataset is a collection of text data compiled from various Usenet discussion groups, originally curated by Ken Lang. This modification aims to enhance the dataset's usability and accessibility for research, education, and data science projects. By removing empty entries and converting it to CSV format, the dataset becomes more manageable and suitable for analysis using popular data science tools and techniques. This modified version retains the essence of the original dataset while improving its practicality for a wider audience interested in text analysis and natural language processing tasks.

The modification made to the dataset found at the link: https://www.kaggle.com/code/nandaprasetia/view-20-newsgroups
title: CSV-20NewsGroups
